field.name: summary
field.value: Patch for SubDependency Resolution in CreationContext to attempt type conversion.

field.name: description
field.value:
Changed the CreationContext to attempt type conversion on the Resolve method if the value is a string, the dependency type is not a string and the type converter can convert to it. This required that the Default Kernel pass an ITypeConverter, which I get from the sub systems. Also added a test case for this which resolves an Int dependency passed to addtional parameters as a string.
Patch created on the InversionOfControl folder.

comment.author: ayenderahien
comment.text: Please generate a new patch, this one is no longer valid

comment.author: hammett
comment.text: Couldnt apply the patch, but got the gist of the idea. Thanks

comment.author: hammett
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Fixed''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''Future''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Work Started'' to ''Resolved''.
